text: @ScottGottliebMD @realDonaldTrump Mr President @realDonaldTrump being a Indian, can I expect to get this drug to India 🇮🇳 as soon as possible? So our people will also get some relief out of this nonsense covid-19 virus. #Gilead #COVID__19 #USINDO #friendzone
